# size

**Instance Property**

The dimensions of the video node, in points.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var size: CGSize { get set }
```

```swift
var size: CGSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is the size of the video used to instantiate the node.

## Setting the Video Node’s Visual Properties

- **anchorPoint**: The point in the sprite that corresponds to the node’s position.
